revised_title: Aerodynamic Forces on an Oscillating Aerofoil in a Free Jet
tldr: The authors study the aerodynamic forces acting on an oscillating aerofoil in a free jet. They develop a theory that generalizes the classical theory for an oscillating aerofoil in an infinite stream and provides corrections for open-jet wind tunnel measurements. The results are expressed in terms of a generalized Theodorsen function, which has applications in improving wind tunnel tests for oscillating aerofoils.
